languages.text: "Будет исполнено. Я уже послал людей за достаточно толстой цепью".
"It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."
languages.original_text: "Будет исполнено. Я уже послал людей за достаточно толстой цепью".

traits.locale_text: "It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."
"It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."
"It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."
"It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."
"It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."

languages.text: "Wird erledigt. Ich habe bereits eine Kette angefordert, die stark genug für ihn ist."
languages.original_text: "It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."

traits.locale_text: "Wird erledigt. Ich habe bereits eine Kette angefordert, die stark genug für ihn ist."

languages.text: « À vos ordres. J'ai déjà demandé à ce que l'on apporte une chaîne suffisamment épaisse pour lui résister. »
languages.original_text: "It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres. J'ai déjà demandé à ce que l'on apporte une chaîne suffisamment épaisse pour lui résister. »

languages.text: 「了解しました。彼を繋ぎ止められるほどの太さの鎖は、すでに手配済みです」
languages.original_text: "It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."

traits.locale_text: 「了解しました。彼を繋ぎ止められるほどの太さの鎖は、すでに手配済みです」

languages.text: «Así se hará. Ya he encargado una cadena suficientemente gruesa para contenerlo».
languages.original_text: "It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."

traits.locale_text: «Así se hará. Ya he encargado una cadena suficientemente gruesa para contenerlo».

languages.text: “遵命，大人。我已经派人备好了足够粗的铁链把它拴住。”
languages.original_text: "It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，大人。我已经派人备好了足够粗的铁链把它拴住。”

languages.text: "Anlaşıldı. Bağlamak için kalınca bir zincir bulmalarını emrettim bile."
languages.original_text: "It will be done. I've already sent for a chain thick enough to hold him."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşıldı. Bağlamak için kalınca bir zincir bulmalarını emrettim bile."
